footer.description: Explore the majestic heritage of the Buton Palace Fortress â€“ from unique destinations to inspiring historical stories, all in one interactive platform!

tentang.title: About Us
tentang.intro: We are a digital platform to introduce the charm of tourism, culture, and history of Buton to the world.
tentang.mission1: This website aims to introduce the natural and cultural richness of the Buton region, including Baubau City and its surroundings. By utilizing web technology, we aim to make it easier for travelers to find and explore the best destinations.
tentang.mission2: We believe that accurate and engaging information can help both locals and tourists plan meaningful and memorable trips.
